00004 template<class _Container>
00005 class WVariable
00006 {
00007 public:
00008   typedef _Container Container;
00009   typedef int (_Container::*SetCallback)(int index, const void *value);
00010   typedef int (_Container::*GetCallback)(int index, void *value, int &size);
00011 
00015   enum ValueType
00016   {
00017     TYPE_BOOL, 
00018     TYPE_INT32, 
00019     TYPE_DOUBLE, 
00020     TYPE_STRING, 
00021     TYPE_VECTOR_INT32, 
00022     TYPE_VECTOR_DOUBLE, 
00023     TYPE_DETECTORINFO, 
00024     TYPE_DETECTORREGION, 
00025     TYPE_ANALYZERREGION 
00026   };
00027 
00028   WVariable(_Container *container, SetCallback setCallback, GetCallback getCallback, ValueType valueType);
00029   WVariable(const WVariable &src);
00030   ~WVariable();

00032   int valueType() const;
00033   int set(int index, const void *value);
00034   int get(int index, void *value, int &size);
00035

00037   _Container *container_;

00039   GetCallback getCallback_;
